short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A captivating character with glowing eyes

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ethereal Glimpse redefines your browsing experience with an artistic, luminous background featuring a captivating character with glowing eyes. This extension merges beauty and functionality by incorporating a real-time clock and live weather updates, helping you stay on track while enjoying the striking visual atmosphere. Transform your new tab into a blend of elegance and utility.
